Translation:
Enabled: Only haul enough ingredients for one product first to start production as soon as possible. Can be useful when there is not enough items to fill the buffer completely.
Disabled: Bundle the ingredients for the buffer and the first production into one request. Potentially save time by reducing round-trips for workers. Production starts only when the buffer is completely filled. Can be useful when the crafting time is shorter than ingredient hauling time.
Restricts the number of items per hauling task. Can be useful to reduce resource starving if a construction site requires the same ingredients.

Ingredients buffered for {0} production(s)
Buffer capacity supports {1} production(s)
Refill buffer if the ingredients cannot support this many productions
